title: Apocalyptic Vibes
description:
This week, Slate Money talks about the exit of Jony Ive, the man behind Apple’s most iconic designs, discusses the employee upset at Wayfair over the company’s involvement with detention centers and answers a listener question about the Chinese bank Baoshang.  
== That Photo of Jony Ive == 

And in the Slate Plus segment: Billionaires and their taxes.   
Email: slatemoney@slate.comTwitter: @felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas,@EmilyRPeck
Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
